header.description: Single transaction record with formatted datetime fields and parameter-supplied logo

semantics: All tokens are pass-through from a single transaction record. No filtering required as the report displays one pre-selected transaction. The logo_url is provided as a runtime parameter.
transformations: Format transactions.created_at as DD-MM-YYYY HH:MM:SS string for generated_datetime display
Concatenate transactions.transaction_date and transactions.transaction_time with space separator for transaction_datetime display
